remarks: In a Moore system, a set is _independent_ if no element of the set is in the closure of the set with the element removed (Section 0.6 in [Gratzer] p. 27; Definition 4.1.1 in [FaureFrolicher] p. 83.) ` mrInd ` is a class function which takes a Moore system to its set of independent sets.  (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
statement:
df-mri $p |- mrInd = ( c e. U. ran Moore |-> { s e. ~P U. c | A. x e. s -. x e. ( ( mrCls ` c ) ` ( s \ { x } ) ) } ) $.
$d c s x $.
